thread.title: Sam Bradford stinks, but at least Eagles' defense is great | The No-Huddle Show (PODCAST)
thread.title_full: Sam Bradford stinks, but at least Eagles' defense is great | The No-Huddle Show (PODCAST)

author: Eliot Shorr-Parks | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Sam Bradford stinks, but at least Eagles' defense is great | The No-Huddle Show (PODCAST)
text:
Comments 
Good thing the Eagles ' defense was on its game Monday night... 
In this week's episode of The No-Huddle Show , Eliot Shorr-Parks, Mark Eckel and Joe Giglio break down everything from the Eagles' relatively easy 27-7 win over the Giants . You know there will be no shortage of talk about Sam Bradford's continued struggles. 
Be sure to subscribe to the podcast on iTunes or Stitcher , and get early access to download each episode. 
Like what you hear? Rate us on iTunes , leave a comment below, or send us a tweet to let us know: @EliotShorrParks , @MarkEckel08 , and @JoeGiglioSports . Plus, be sure to follow the show on Twitter @TheNoHuddleShow . THE NO-HUDDLE SHOW, Ep. 13: Sam Bradford stinks right now, but at least the Eagles' defense is great 
The Eagles just crushed their division rival to take over first place in the NFC East, but given how sloppy the passing game was, it doesn't feel as good as it should. Subscribe to the podcast on iTunes or Stitcher . 
Eliot Shorr-Parks may be reached at eshorrpa@njadvancemedia.com . Follow him on Twitter @EliotShorrParks . Find NJ.com Sports on Facebook.
